name: Poke Bubble Advendture
description:
Poke Bubble Advendture is a whole new very addicted puzzle game and One of the best casual games so far!
Poke Bubble Advendture is such an intuitive game that it takes just seconds to get started. Long time motiviation is guaranted and the highscore is an additional motivation booster. All in all: Poke Bubble Advendture is an awesome game for your device!
Enjoy!

Any suggestions are appreciated!
Please contact us: yuutit@gmail.com
